Title: Requires the surrender of registration and license plates for a suspended or revoked license
Summary: Requires the surrender of registration and license plates for a suspended or revoked license.
LawCode: Add ยง403-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the surrender of number plates of all motor vehicles which a person has registered where such person has a suspended or revoked license
